abstract: A broad sell-off dragged all sectors of the market lower, with financial stocks hit particularly hard.
snippet: A broad sell-off dragged all sectors of the market lower, with financial stocks hit particularly hard.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street tumbled to new lows on Thursday and shares of Citigroup, once the largest bank on Wall Street, dropped briefly below $1 as deepening worries about the financial sector and General Motors sent investors running for cover.

headline.main: Stocks Plunge on Worries Over Financial Sector
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on G.M.’s Viability and Retail Sales
